article:
'Encode ApS' is a Danish provider of Marketing Resource Management (MRM) Systems
to some of the largest global advertising agencies, manufacturers and retail
chains within the international business community. The company is an expert in
development and deployment of flexible marketing tools and solutions to
organizations, who want to enhance workflow efficiency and knowledge sharing
between internal departments and external agencies, to create dynamic
communications.

Encode provides retailers, advertising agencies and marketing departments with
configurable on demand marketing software, that helps with the upfront planning
of marketing activities including [http://encode.dk/encode-retail.html Retail
Campaign Management], Digital Asset Management, Brand Management, Campaign
Management and Workflow and Project Management.
